name: Pizza Party (CoffeeChemist)
description:
In a world of wacky toppings. Only one can revolutionize the way we eat pizza.  Take control of four weird pizza toppings and fight it out with your friends to be declared the newest pizza innovation in wacky minigames.

[Features]

-4 Unique and interesting characters.

-Easy pick up and play controls

- 4 player couch co-op

-2 Unique and exciting minigames

-Questionable catchphrases

(Requires 4 ps3/ps4/xbox 360 or xbox one controllers to play)
